item.description: @davewiner @rtanglao Here‚Äôs a screenshot. Happy to use something else (email, GitHub) to write it out longer than 280 characters. https://t.co/QP5Ci776KS

item.description:
@rtanglao @davewiner What‚Äôs the best way to send feedback?

First feedback from me: The underlying URL of the feed (the href) should be the feed itself, otherwise people will share the XML Viewer URL, like Roland did. It could just be a separate field.
item.source:markdown:
@rtanglao @davewiner What‚Äôs the best way to send feedback?
First feedback from me: The underlying URL of the feed (the href) should be the feed itself, otherwise people will share the XML Viewer URL, like Roland did. It could just be a separate field.

item.description: https://t.co/HwkOcN9idw is still around, and someone I know still know still uses it. Amazing.
item.source:markdown: https://t.co/HwkOcN9idw is still around, and someone I know still know still uses it. Amazing.

item.description:
@jeffjedras Oh man, I‚Äôm jealous that you got to see it. Such a great finish.

Yeah, the Elam Ending is so great. Some people don‚Äôt like that it can end on a free throw, but that makes free throws exciting! And, free throws need to be part of your repertoire in an Elam Ending league.
item.source:markdown:
@jeffjedras Oh man, I‚Äôm jealous that you got to see it. Such a great finish.
Yeah, the Elam Ending is so great. Some people don‚Äôt like that it can end on a free throw, but that makes free throws exciting! And, free throws need to be part of your repertoire in an Elam Ending league.

item.description: @stuiemclaren @ianhanomansing I‚Äôm on Team #NeverRecline, but I would consider reclining if I knew the person behind me was doing it. ü§î
item.source:markdown: @stuiemclaren @ianhanomansing I‚Äôm on Team #NeverRecline, but I would consider reclining if I knew the person behind me was doing it. ü§î

item.description:
I‚Äôm watching from the other side of the country. Let‚Äôs go @HM_HoneyBadgers! ü¶° https://t.co/dGr3G399c7

Always stay till the end.

I love the Elam Ending so much. Basketball fans in the major leagues (WNBA and NBA) are going to love it when they put it in place. https://t.co/cC3DBcKVhI

LFG! https://t.co/EfxzbMHGpc

The Elam Ending makes it possible to win on a free throw, but you know what? Maybe that that makes the most boring part of basketball a little more exciting, and will encourage players to work in improving their free throw percentage. https://t.co/oGYzmAWBSU
item.source:markdown:

item.description:
@ianhanomansing I never recline. I‚Äôd select a seat that doesn‚Äôt recline if it saved me a few dollars. Would the airline then charge a little more for the seat behind it?

The seats at the back of the plane usually don‚Äôt recline? I never want to be very last person off, though.
item.source:markdown:
@ianhanomansing I never recline. I‚Äôd select a seat that doesn‚Äôt recline if it saved me a few dollars. Would the airline then charge a little more for the seat behind it?
The seats at the back of the plane usually don‚Äôt recline? I never want to be very last person off, though.

item.description: @AnakanaSchofiel Ambidextrous implies equally good at both sides. I can‚Äôt switch. I don‚Äôt remember much of anything from my childhood (it‚Äôs the reason I don‚Äôt feel a lot of nostalgia in general, whatever), so I don‚Äôt know why I write with my left hand but use scissors in my right hand.
item.source:markdown: @AnakanaSchofiel Ambidextrous implies equally good at both sides. I can‚Äôt switch. I don‚Äôt remember much of anything from my childhood (it‚Äôs the reason I don‚Äôt feel a lot of nostalgia in general, whatever), so I don‚Äôt know why I write with my left hand but use scissors in my right hand.

item.description: @AnakanaSchofiel Yes, except, and don‚Äôt tell anybody this, I‚Äôm right-handed doing everything that isn‚Äôt writing. I still get to claim Barack Obama as one of my own. #LeftHandersDay
item.source:markdown: @AnakanaSchofiel Yes, except, and don‚Äôt tell anybody this, I‚Äôm right-handed doing everything that isn‚Äôt writing. I still get to claim Barack Obama as one of my own. #LeftHandersDay

item.description: @AnakanaSchofiel Being left-handed gets in the way sometimes, because it‚Äôs a right-handed world. That said, every time one of us sees another person writing left-handed, we make eye contact, and have an instant rapport. #LeftHandersDay
item.source:markdown: @AnakanaSchofiel Being left-handed gets in the way sometimes, because it‚Äôs a right-handed world. That said, every time one of us sees another person writing left-handed, we make eye contact, and have an instant rapport. #LeftHandersDay

item.description: @midweekcycling I did see one in the footage I saw in people‚Äôs tweets, so I wouldn‚Äôt have been alone. It‚Äôs just hard to imagine feeling like I‚Äôd be part of the protest when I‚Äôm riding a rental.
